Lamentation, mourning, and woe sighed forth in a sermon preached in the parish-church of St. Martin in the Fields, on the 9th day of September : being the next Lords-day after the dismal fire in the city of London / by Nath. Hardy ... Hardy, Nathaniel, 1618-1670.
[8], 31 p.
Printed by Tho. Newcomb for William Grantham, London : 1666.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
